# TaskLocal()

**Macro**

Macro that introduces a [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/Swift/TaskLocal] binding.

## Declaration

```swift
@attached(accessor) @attached(peer, names: prefixed(`$`)) macro TaskLocal()
```

## Overview

For information about task-local bindings, see [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/Swift/TaskLocal].



## Task-Local Storage

- **TaskLocal**: Wrapper type that defines a task-local value key.
